title: Enterprise E2E Framework Migration — Playwright + POM Architecture
description: Migrated legacy Selenium framework to Playwright with Page Object Model, improving test stability and reducing flakiness by 40%
fullDescription: Comprehensive E2E automation project showcasing Playwright with Page Object Model design pattern. Features custom fixtures, cross-browser testing, parallel execution, and visual regression testing. Tests the Sauce Demo e-commerce application with complete coverage of authentication, product browsing, cart management, and checkout flows. Includes detailed reporting, trace debugging, and CI/CD integration examples.
achievements: Implemented scalable POM architecture for maintainability
Achieved cross-browser testing (Chromium, Firefox, WebKit)
Built custom fixtures and utilities for test reusability
Integrated comprehensive reporting with screenshots and traces

title: Enterprise Performance Testing — k6 Load & Stress Testing Suite
description: Comprehensive performance testing suite with k6, covering load, stress, and spike testing scenarios with Grafana monitoring
fullDescription: Professional performance testing project demonstrating k6 for load, stress, and spike testing. Tests ReqRes API with realistic load patterns, custom metrics, and meaningful thresholds. Includes examples of gradual ramp-up, sudden traffic spikes, and stress testing to find breaking points. Features custom metrics, Grafana integration, and CI/CD pipeline examples for continuous performance validation.
achievements: Implemented load, stress, and spike test scenarios
Created custom metrics and thresholds for SLA validation
Integrated with Grafana for real-time monitoring
Established performance baselines for CI/CD gates

title: API Testing with Postman & Newman
description: Complete API testing framework using Postman collections and Newman CLI with comprehensive validation and reporting
fullDescription: Professional API testing project showcasing Postman and Newman for REST API validation. Tests ReqRes API with complete CRUD operations, authentication flows, schema validation, and data-driven testing. Features pre-request scripts, test chaining, environment management, and beautiful HTML reports. Demonstrates contract testing, error handling validation, and CI/CD integration patterns.
achievements: Validated complete CRUD operations and authentication flows
Implemented schema validation for contract testing
Created data-driven tests with multiple iterations
Generated comprehensive HTML reports with newman-reporter-htmlextra

title: OWASP Security Testing — Automated Vulnerability Scanning & GDPR Compliance
description: Security testing framework covering OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities and GDPR compliance validation with automated remediation reports
fullDescription: Comprehensive security testing project demonstrating OWASP Top 10 vulnerability scanning, SQL injection testing, XSS detection, and compliance validation. Tests OWASP Juice Shop with automated security scans using OWASP ZAP and custom Playwright scripts. Includes GDPR compliance checks, authentication security testing, and detailed security reporting. Essential for QA engineers in regulated industries.
achievements: Automated OWASP Top 10 vulnerability detection
Implemented SQL injection and XSS testing
Validated GDPR compliance requirements
Generated detailed security reports with remediation steps

title: AWS Lambda Testing with Terraform
description: Cloud-native testing for AWS Lambda functions using Terraform IaC and LocalStack for serverless architecture validation
fullDescription: Demonstrates infrastructure testing for AWS Lambda using Terraform for Infrastructure as Code and LocalStack for local AWS simulation. Tests serverless functions, API Gateway, DynamoDB integration, and validates Terraform configurations. Includes integration tests, infrastructure validation, and end-to-end workflows. Perfect example of cloud-native QA practices with cost-effective local development using LocalStack.
achievements: Validated Infrastructure as Code with Terraform
Tested serverless Lambda functions locally with LocalStack
Integrated DynamoDB and API Gateway testing
Implemented cost-effective cloud testing strategy

title: Kubernetes Test Orchestration
description: Container orchestration testing with Kubernetes, including deployment validation, chaos engineering, and test execution in K8s clusters
fullDescription: Comprehensive Kubernetes testing project demonstrating test orchestration in container environments. Tests deployments, services, auto-scaling, and resilience using chaos engineering. Runs tests as Kubernetes Jobs with kind/minikube for local development. Validates service discovery, networking, rolling updates, and pod scheduling. Showcases modern microservices testing and DevOps integration.
achievements: Orchestrated tests as Kubernetes Jobs
Implemented chaos engineering for resilience testing
Validated auto-scaling and deployment strategies
Built containerized test execution pipeline

title: LLM-Augmented Test Generation — GPT-4 Integration PoC
description: Proof of Concept: Integrated OpenAI GPT-4 to auto-generate test cases for API contracts (TypeScript), cutting authoring time by 65%
fullDescription: Innovative project showcasing AI integration in QA workflows using OpenAI GPT-4. Demonstrates automated test case generation from requirements, intelligent bug report analysis and categorization, realistic test data generation, coverage gap identification, and flaky test detection using ML. Represents the future of QA engineering where AI augments human expertise for 10x productivity gains.
achievements: Automated test generation from natural language requirements
Built intelligent bug analyzer with root cause suggestions
Created AI-powered test data generator
Implemented ML-based flaky test detection

title: Playwright Migration & Framework Evolution
description: Led enterprise-wide migration from Cypress to Playwright, reducing execution time by 30% and expanding test coverage
fullDescription: Spearheaded the complete migration of the automation framework from Cypress to Playwright for a design collaboration platform. Designed custom fixtures, utilities, and reporting pipelines that became the foundation for scalable automation across multiple teams. The migration not only improved stability but also enabled testing of complex user workflows that were previously challenging.
achievements: Reduced test execution time by 30% through parallel execution
Mentored cross-functional teams on Playwright best practices
Built reusable fixtures and utilities adopted company-wide
Achieved zero critical post-migration bugs in production

title: Games Marketplace Quality Strategy
description: Owned end-to-end quality strategy for cloud-native gaming platform with distributed microservices
fullDescription: Architected and implemented comprehensive quality strategy for a Games Marketplace platform serving millions of users. Built Cypress E2E suites integrated with Jenkins, cutting release cycles by 60%. Collaborated directly with CTO and architects to embed quality gates into deployment pipelines. Implemented API performance testing and monitoring that significantly improved system resilience.
achievements: Cut release cycle time by 60% through automation
Validated large-scale JSON data pipelines across microservices
Implemented shift-left testing practices reducing production bugs
Enhanced observability through strategic quality gates

title: Full-Stack Todo Application
description: Production-ready CRUD app with authentication, deployed on self-hosted Kubernetes with full CI/CD
fullDescription: Built a complete full-stack application from scratch to demonstrate modern DevOps and testing practices. Features responsive React frontend, Node.js backend, MongoDB database, all containerized with Docker and deployed behind Traefik reverse proxy with HTTPS. Comprehensive Playwright E2E test suite integrated into GitHub Actions pipeline ensures quality on every commit.
achievements: Deployed on self-hosted Kubernetes cluster
Secured with HTTPS and proper authentication
100% E2E test coverage for critical user flows
Automated deployment pipeline with zero-downtime releases
